unnormalised: Ani, nimannem Goa chi trip plan keli! Voi, kitlinch vorsam sapnan ani poisaam zomo korun, bhau, ti zat'taa. Vhoddli dokdukhi mhanje ravonk khoim mevchem tem tharavpachi aslli. Tuka khobor asa, borem kitein tori zai punn soglle poixe fakt roomakuch karchunk naakat. Suruvaat sadharan lokan vapartat tech website-anchea vangdda keli: Booking.com, MakeMyTrip. North Goant kaim bore zage disle, Baga lagim asle bhaxen, punn address mat punn vollkhunk zaina asle! "H. No. 246/A, Gaura Vaddo, Calangute, Bardez, Goa 403516" kitlein tori asle – taxi driverak sodd re tinn vosream kings beers pilyanantar sangunk!
normalised: अरे, फाइनली गोवा वचपाचो प्लॅन जालो! कितलेशे दीस सोपून आनी सांबाळून, भावा, आतां जाता म्हण! रावपाक खंयची सुवात सोदची, हेंच व्हडलें दुखणें आशिल्लें. तुका खबर आसा, कितें तरी बरें जाय आशिल्लें, पूण रूमचेरच सगळें दुडू खर्च करपाक न्हय. नेहमींप्रमाण सुरू केलें: बी-ओ-ओ-के-आय-एन-जी डॉट कॉम, मेक माय ट्रिप. उत्तर गोंयांत बरीं स्थळां दिसलीं, बागें लागीं सारकीं, पूण पत्तो एकदम गोंदळिल्लो! "एच. नं. दोनशें सव्वीस स्लेश ए, गौरा वाड्डो, कळंगुट, बार्देस, गोंय चार शून्य तीन पांच सोळा" – तीन ए-एम-आर टॅक्सी ड्रायव्हराक कशी सांगची, कांय किंग्स बिअर पिल्या उपरांत!
text: Ani, nimannem Goa chi trip plan keli! Voi, kitlinch vorsam sapnan ani poisaam zomo korun, bhau, ti zat'taa. Vhoddli dokdukhi mhanje ravonk khoim mevchem tem tharavpachi aslli. Tuka khobor asa, borem kitein tori zai punn soglle poixe fakt roomakuch karchunk naakat. Suruvaat sadharan lokan vapartat tech website-anchea vangdda keli: Booking.com, MakeMyTrip. North Goant kaim bore zage disle, Baga lagim asle bhaxen, punn address mat punn vollkhunk zaina asle! "H. No. 246/A, Gaura Vaddo, Calangute, Bardez, Goa 403516" kitlein tori asle – taxi driverak sodd re tinn vosream kings beers pilyanantar sangunk!

unnormalised: Mhaka dislem mhoji ixtt Priya Airbnb-ichi kasam kortalem. Te check kelem, ani purnn bhoron gelem. "Villa Sunshine, St. Alex Church lagim, Curca, Ilhas, Goa 403108" – borem aikota, pun Curca, Ilhas kithem *asa*? Mhaka dor ek zago Google Map korunk poddlem. Goan address-achem kithem asa? Te puzzle bhaxen asat! Eka cottage-achem address-ui dekhlem "Opposite Dinky’s Shop, Anjuna, Goa – 403509". Dinky’s Shop? Gambhirponnan?
normalised: Mhaka dislem mhoji ixtt Priya A-I-R-B-N-B-chi kasam ghevn sangta mhunn. Te check kelem, ani eksureakuch puro zaalem. "Villa Sunshine, St. Alex Churchchea laginch, Curca, Ilhas, Goa char shunya tin ek shunya att" – aikunk borem dista, punn Curca, Ilhas khoim asa? Mhaka dor eka zageak Google Map korun dekhchem poddlem. Goenche address koxe asat? Te koddeanche bhaxen astat! Ek cottage-cho address polloilo "Opposite Dinky's Shop, Anjuna, Goa – char shunya tin panch shunya nou". Dinky's Shop? Khorench?
text: Mhaka dislem mhoji ixtt Priya Airbnb-ichi kasam kortalem. Te check kelem, ani purnn bhoron gelem. "Villa Sunshine, St. Alex Church lagim, Curca, Ilhas, Goa 403108" – borem aikota, pun Curca, Ilhas kithem *asa*? Mhaka dor ek zago Google Map korunk poddlem. Goan address-achem kithem asa? Te puzzle bhaxen asat! Eka cottage-achem address-ui dekhlem "Opposite Dinky’s Shop, Anjuna, Goa – 403509". Dinky’s Shop? Gambhirponnan?

unnormalised: thoddi anik vyavasthit ravonk nirdhar kela. ek spreadsheet (haanv tech vyakti mhunn). column 1: hotel/airbnb-achem naav. column 2: pureponnacho patto (gondhollelo goycho prokaar). column 3: sopo patto (udhaaronnarth, "baga darya laginch" vo "ponnje firgojek laginch"). column 4: pin code (khup mhotvachem!). column 5: proti raat kimot. kitleankuch zago pin code ukteponnan sanginaa tumka zait mhonn tharoknaa! pizza order korunk asaadhy zata.
normalised: thoddo odhik net'ttiko zauncheak nirnnay ghetla. ek spreadsheet toyar kela (hoi, hanv tech vyakti). poilo column: hotel slash e-ai-ar-bi-en-bi nanv. dusro column: purai address (goacho goddgoddit prakar). tisro column: sopo kel'lo address (zoxe, "bag beacha lagim" vo "ponnjechea igrej lagim"). chovtho column: pin code (khub mhotvacho!). kitleokuy suvato spoxtt pin code sangonakai tum tumkam visvas ravonakai! pizza order korop okkyom.
text: thoddi anik vyavasthit ravonk nirdhar kela. ek spreadsheet (haanv tech vyakti mhunn). column 1: hotel/airbnb-achem naav. column 2: pureponnacho patto (gondhollelo goycho prokaar). column 3: sopo patto (udhaaronnarth, "baga darya laginch" vo "ponnje firgojek laginch"). column 4: pin code (khup mhotvachem!). column 5: proti raat kimot. kitleankuch zago pin code ukteponnan sanginaa tumka zait mhonn tharoknaa! pizza order korunk asaadhy zata.

unnormalised: khup voram sodun ani cross-reference korun (dhanyavad, Google Maps!), hanvem tem 3 options-am meren unnem kelem. "Sea Breeze Resort, Cavelossim Beach, Salcete, Goa 403731", "Casa de Flora, Morjim, Pernem, Goa 403512" ani "The Lazy Frog, Vagator, Bardez, Goa – 403509". Soglleanche bore reviews asle, budget-ant asle, ani… kiteak tori somzonk yetale tea adresanchi asle.
normalised: ghanto sodun ani cross-reference korun (dhanyavad, Google Maps!), hanv teen vikalpakank denvlo. "Sea Breeze Resort, Cavelossim Beach, Salcete, Goa char shunya teen saat teen ek", "Casa de Flora, Morjim, Pernem, Goa char shunya teen panch ek don" ani "The Lazy Frog, Vagator, Bardez, Goa – char shunya teen panch shunya nau". Soglleank borem review aslem, budget bhitor aslem, ani... thoddem somzochem addresso aslem.
text: khup voram sodun ani cross-reference korun (dhanyavad, Google Maps!), hanvem tem 3 options-am meren unnem kelem. unnormalised: शेवटीं "सी ब्रीझ रिसॉर्ट" बुक केलें. कावेलोस्सिम बीच खूब सोबीत आसा अशें आयकलें, आनी पत्तो... जमतो दिसता. आनी ताचे भायर, थंय एक खूब नांवाजल्ली सीफूड रेस्टॉरंट लागींच आसा म्हूण रिव्ह्यूंत बरयलां. बोनस! म्हाका टॅक्सी ड्रायव्हर रस्तो चुकोना म्हूण हांवें गुगल मॅप्सचो स्क्रीनशॉट मेरेन काडून फोनार सेव्ह करून दवरला.

unnormalised: Atam fattim urlelem mhanje mazo basto bandhun 10/10/2024 tarkekacho flight dhorpak. Mhaka subhechha di! Ani konakui Goenche address sopronne khatir tips asto zalear, mhaka sang. Gambhirpan. Hanv porot yetna zateli takleef khatir soddun ravtam. Khas korun porot vetna hanvem Konkani rastianchim navam shikonk zai. "Susegaad" jivit, hanv yeta... nimannem.
normalised: Atam urlaa tem mhonnllear mhojeo pisttyo bhorop ani dha october don hojaar chovisacher tem vimaan dhorop. Mhakaa shubhechchaa dii! Ani konnakui Goan adres utaroche tip astaa zalear, mhakaa sanga. Gambhirtayen. Hanv aataa porot yenvchek tyaar zataam. Zaaitea mhojem Goan galiinche naam shikunk zaii hanv portolem fuddem. "Susegaad" jivit, hanv yetaam...velaar.
